review: this is a great application that has enabled me to access, use and annotate my documents on my multiple devices. A very functional application that I am satisfied with. I do have a couple of suggestions and complaints. I am using this application on my Chromebook and it does not let me group my documents in a folder. In fact, there is no option to create a folder! I would also like to request a feature that allows us to open multiple documents simultaneously on different tabs. thanks

Love its simple UI. Good for basic reading and annotation. Presents too many premium features around the UI (home, menu, etc) for the free user. Even share feature has the whole body content dedicated to signing-in/creating Adobe's account while the standard share feature is tucked at the bottom of the screen as clipper icon. Not interested in getting into their ecosystem.

Wow this app is HORRID. The interface makes you fight it for every little edit and change, the bullet point options are black when in dark mode so you can't see them, and the reason why I am deleting it is because it forces you to stay zoomed in on the document when editing. That's right, you cannot zoom out and view a full page at once, you can only zoom out far enough to see the entire width of the page, and no more. Oh, and you can't create a blank PDF. The "create" option is for converting

Missing text... I edited some resumes and got everything I could edited, given the limited features of the program, and saved them as they appeared fine in the original viewing. As I started to send them to where they needed to be, I noticed the thumbnail looked different. When I opened the documents I found that all of the text I had edited was a blank space!! Hours of work went in to the edits for those resumes just to find out they were ruined because of your program! Worst $10 ever spent!!

All you seem to be able to do is make text boxes and add images. It's not even possible to add bullet points from what I can see. The fact that they ask for a subscription for this barely functional app that is only better than Notepad because the text is in boxes. That's it, it's not better formatted, it's literally just in a box. If I could give negative starts for wasting my time I would.

Amazing in principle, awful in practice. The limited functionality has caused me hours of work. Highlight coloring is limited to 9. There is no manual saving apart from saving a copy, and the document is supposed to save automatically, but it does not. I have lost many hours of work, as on multiple occasions saving it as a copy would result in saving a previous version rather than the one I am working on. My annotations have disappeared in front of me. Add a manual 'save as' function.

Not ideal for multi-device systems and students. I still can't manage to get any of my comments or notes to sync using the cloud. I've tried everything. It's okay enough as a reader - it does refuse to open anything I just downloaded - but it still leaves much to be desired as an annotation tool. I've completely lost hundreds of pages of notes before & when notes do stick around they're trapped on a single device...

It allows you to VIEW the file. I received a 400 page document from work which was manually scanned..... upside down. There is a simple rotate button within the pc version at the top toolbar. This option is not available on the Android app unless you subscribe. The name of this app in the Play Store is, "Adobe Acrobat Reader: Edit PDF." It was a free download. BUT it appears that you can only EDIT if you subscribe. I learned this only after granting access to my Drive. I find this misleading.

I like this app a lot! It's practical, simple, and it allows you to highlight the snippets you find important. And the system of uploading pdfs to the cloud is perfect. I've got just one suggestion: I think that adding fixed options to the screen position so that when turning my cellphone to another position it does not turn the screen as well.

so, i go to start my 7 day trial and after severl unsuccessful attempts at starting a FREE trial, my conclusion is that the "Trial" sign-up checks to see if it can successfully charge whatever you've entered as a form of payment. When you enter your card number, that number should not be checked until AFTER the trial period is up. Fix this its broken. Also, app saves everything you put into the subscription areas. It doesnt get rid of them, even if you clear data/cache. Dangerous. DO NOT USE.

Super frustrating, I'm attempting to fill in a check list for work using a fillable PDF and the words are getting cut off but I cant find anyway to adjust the size of the font. It should be a basic feature but for some reason they've either pay locked it, though when I signed up for the free trial of pro it didn't get better, or they've just not made font size adjustment a feature. This shouldn't be this hard. The app is totally fine if you want to view a PDF but not actually use it

Very disappointed. Paid for premium only to find out it doesnt do what I was looking for. Sure, it can "edit" your document (if you call it that) but just not how you may want it. I just wanted to delete an odd line or two. When trying to edit and do what I want, it deletes the whole entire page . Not just a line here or there. Regretting paying now. So now im stuck with a premium subscription thats no good to me. ðŸ˜’

Got the app for my flip 4 then Looks for full version When I try to edit the same documents on my laptop. Very shocked I paid the subscription for the year as I said on the app ad I can use this from any device Which was the obvious intention to use it both from my phone and laptop.Apparently I have to pay a subscription Separately on my laptop to edit the same documents??It's impossible to talk to someone As there is no direct support email address.

The app said that there was a 7 day trial for the premium membership right before I purchased it, but I was charged right away. Adobe is clearly trying to pull a scam here by saying there's a trial and yet charging you right away. This has never happened with me for another app on the play store and I'm very disappointed.

When did Adobe remove absolutely everything that made it amazing? I am no longer able to type in pdf documents, I have to add a textbox with font that doesn't match anything (trying to fill out court documents is worse), no longer able to zoom out from 125%, Adobe wants access to ALL emails (not excluding personal data in those emails) and all files if you sync it with an email, you should also read what you allow adobe to do when you authorize access to your computer files. Why is Adobe trash?

I only use this app to download and store documents (and occasionally sign docs), but I have experienced no issues or hiccups with the app so far. Just open the app and you can find all your most recently downloaded docs. I have an Android Galaxy and have been using about a year.

DO NOT PURCHASE!! After purchasing the yearly subscription I cannot access the features at all. After attempting to reach out to Adobe for assistance they did not help in any way. Also no refund was provided. Save your money and invest in a different application.

I took 2 stars away for trying to trick me (and others) into a subscription by obscuring the options (such as during login, and storage). Developers -- No one appreciates being tricked. Make the options clear so that the true value of your app will shine through.

Probably a scam. Tried to subscribe. It was asking my google password, still saying it's wrong even when it's the right one. No subscription in Adobe account but I can't remove the card from google account because "it's associated with this subscription". No way to contact Adobe or Google in this, they're hiding.

After the new update there is a problem i am facing, whenever I open a file recieved through whatsApp or any app second time it shows a different name of the file after opening . When I opened the file for the first time it showed the correct name of the file , but when I reopen the same file from WhatsApp it showed totally different name. it's very annoying . This problem is not in the previous update . I hope , you guys understand what I want say . I hope you guys will fix this problem .

After recent updates, the app now wants full access to all your files even files not related to the app and it doesnt have to notify me. Yeah.. this seems a lil sus and intrusive. I just deleted it because all i needed it for is to read pdf's, thats it. Instead it wants to look at everything in my phone. No thanks.

Not sure because I mainly use it as a reader. I would buy the acrobat suite but , too expensive. Although it comes with edit and creator. Great for PDF reader. Allows save or not. Others autosave everthing pdf you touch. I gave 4 stars because of reasons above. More free tools would be awesome.
Extraneous permissions (all files instead of just media files). Automatic login is unwarranted. As a result, using it the first time is frustrating.

Adobe Acrobat Reader is a wonderful App for documents download. It is always neat and clear. Even when you change your phone the contents are intact as long as you are able to sign in. It is inability to sign document that needed to be added to the free edition for better patronage. I commend the developers.

interface is slow on chromebook and task bar disappears when not hovering over it, without ability to lock. at least it isn't warping files when converted, but the tool bar needs some bugs worked out to make the system more user friendly

Simple enough. I'm using the free limited version, which allows only 2 major functions: Comment and Fill & Sign. But I can't find any Help for this version - only info on paid subscriptions is listed. Keeping track of files is also not made easy. Last year, I regret updating to pay for confusing ways to get different things done. I barely used it. The free version should have Help info & option to delete pages not needed to take up less space. Overall, this is a decent Adobe app to have.

Hey so there has been a glitch in the app in my phone where the American as well as the British accent has changed into something which is not understandable at all I have tried to reinstall it but it's of no use and I have checked it in other devices and it's all fine there would love if you can help me with it thanks.
Exceptional with the management of documents. It makes editing and submitting documents a breeze. Thanks to the brain behind this app. It is 100% effective add easy to use.

Every time u open a file it replaces the previous one with the current one. You cant multitask with two files at the same time. Its very annoying to go back in the file manager and reopen the previous one.

When you go to files, they are displayed in no particular order. How is that helpful? Even the most basic pdf reader allows you to sort by file name or date or folder, etc. Why has this basic of most basic features been missed from Adobe in the year 2022? Surely I'm not the only person with more than a few PDFs who can't open anything because i can't find the document i want. Edit: you can't zoom out further than the borders. Why does drive pdf allow it but Adobe no? ðŸ˜¢

The Android version of Adobe Acrobat appears to have a problem. I store the PDF copies of my magazines subscriptions on my OneDrive cloud. I can open all with the Acrobat Reader on my laptop but a significant number come back as Â¨damaged or corruptedÂ¨ on the Acrobat Reader on my Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+. Since it was working fine before the update, I assume the problem showed up with it. Update: I can open my Â¨damagedÂ¨ Scientific American copies with MS Word. How embarassing.

Exceptional experience. I would recommend the Adobe Acrobat reader app to family and friends without a doubt because it's so easy to use and understand. I love editing my photos on the app, and the quality of the photos appear to be better than the platform they originated from (once printed I will update the info as necessary in regards to the quality). Adobe has additional apps to consider as well. Adobe makes learning enjoyable and fun for the beginner. Adobe, I look forward to future apps.

It's a shame that your home screen/ start screen set-up is just stupid. And whenever I wanna find something, I manually need to go to "on this device" to find a new pdf file. And to make it worse, many of the recent or new downloaded pdf are always missing there! Completely gone, no cluse. But then when I search for them using their name then suddenly they stars to show up in the "on this device" area. Are you blind or something that it didn't come up to you at this moment of the day?!

Best PDF reader. I've been using only the free version and it get's a rating of five, imagine what the premium will be like!. Nonetheless if possible can you please make the files on one's device all appear in the same place in grid form with cover page displayed for each PDF and not sorted according to location like it is now.

The overhaul to the GUI for the latest update is hideous, and it takes more taps to get to things like Night Mode. Further GUI updates have removed the ability to return to the previous page that you were on, which is inconvenient and frustrating if you tap a link by accident. Adobe needs to stop breaking what was a perfectly usable GUI

After the recent update, the full screen display, which was previously fine, now has an added white bar to accommodate with the notch which I find super disruptive when I'm scrolling through the pages. Please fix it by the next update, you guys don't need to fix something that's not broken.

I unlocked the premium features last month with a 7 day free trial but after using it for a short while I realised it wasn't what I was looking for and promptly cancelled it. A month later I discovered I had been charged for the annual subscription despite canceling. I contacted the google play store and they said to contact adobe. I went to my adobe account page which directs me back to google play. How can I get a refund?
The lack of auto scroll like the desktop app means it is of limited utility. Also, every page flashes a message "page does not reflow" No way to turn it off? Did not see any ads so that is good.

There's no ability to cancel the subscription within 7 day trial period. I have contacted customer support and submitted screenshots of "no subscription found" and zero response. Today, I was charged for this service that I've tried to cancel as I didn't need the service. Don't subscribe!

I mainly use this app to annotate notes and PDF files. It's been the third time now that after editing a file, everything I added suddenly gets deleted when I close the app after saving. No idea how to recover the deleted notes. I just wasted hours using this.
